description: Shared Services Canada has a requirement for the provision of Atlassian Software Solutions to support the needs of end-users with the vendor selected Atlassian Software.
tags: Bidders must provide proof of trade agreements compliance.
full_summary:
__________________
# Atlassian Software Solutions Request for Proposal

## Request Details

* **Contract Title**: Atlassian Software Solutions
* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00021753:T
* **Publication Date**: February 1, 2023
* **Closing Date**: February 15, 2023 @ 14:00:00 EST

## Contract Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) issues a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Atlassian Software Solutions.

## Contract Requirements

*   **Security Requirements**: None
*   **Trade Agreements**: Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Bidder Inquiries**: Send emails to tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   **Proposal Submission**: The final date for submitting proposals is February 15, 2023 @ 14:00:00 EST

## Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
*   **Contact Information**: Eric Lavigne, eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca, 343-541-8756

## Contract Documents

You can find the contract documents on the P2P Portal at:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5B5689D3-1C74-4F79-AAB4-8A4DC6D68AA8



Also, find a link to the P2P Portal to access the BPM solicitation

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public

Under Solicitation List : BPM018119 Atlassian Software Solutions SSC Atlassian Software Solutions- Amendment 000

(on french version) 
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/E6E0FD27-81EE-46DE-8AC3-762F27FBE28B
